title: Font ID
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804134108im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_5005.jpg)
 I was hoping you could help me to identify the font used for the "Legends" as well as the "Restaurant & Bar" I think they are different, but I might be mistaken. Sorry the picture is at a bit of an angle.
author: hksingh

comments.content: I found the Legends portion! It's Gabriola, however I checked and still don't think Restaurant and Bar is the same font
